speakers.name: Bill Raymond
speakers.title: Host
speakers.shortBio: Bill is a technical content strategist and AI practitioner who uses generative tools daily to ship human-centered documentation and learning experiences.

faq.question: Do I need prior AI experience to join?

blocks.text: No prior AI experience is required. This training is designed for beginners and is still useful for experienced participants who want a more reliable workflow.

faq.question: Do I need anything before the workshop starts?

blocks.text: By the time you take this course, you must have a paid AI account from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, or Microsoft 365 Copilot.

faq.question: How is the workshop delivered, and what if I miss a session?

blocks.text: Sessions are hosted live on Zoom. If you miss a session, there are no official makeup dates, but Bill accommodates reasonable scheduling-conflict requests when possible and shares the best available catch-up option.

faq.question: What will I get by the end (certificate, exercises, and take-home work)?

blocks.text: You will complete hands-on exercises, receive practical take-home materials, and earn a digital certificate of completion after presenting your final project.

faq.question: How can I ask questions before enrolling, and what if I can‚Äôt make this cohort?

blocks.text: If you have questions before enrolling, use the Cambermast contact form. If this cohort timing does not work, we can share upcoming options on the events calendar.

faq.question: üìß Do you have a manager budget-approval letter I can send?

blocks.text: Yes. Use the email template below, open it in your email client, or copy it with one click.

blocks.subject: Request for approval: AI training program
blocks.body:
Hi [Manager Name],

I would like approval to attend [Program Name] with Cambermast.

This training is focused on practical, responsible AI use and includes
hands-on exercises I can apply directly in my role. I expect this will
help me improve speed and quality in [team/process area], while following
our policies and quality standards.

Program: [Program Name]
Dates: [Dates]
Cost: [Cost]
Link: [Program/Event URL]

After the training, I will share key takeaways and specific ways we can
apply what I learned to our team.

Thank you for considering this request.

Best,
[Your Name]

description.summary: Across weekly 2-hour sessions, participants combine strategy discussions with hands-on practice to automate repetitive tasks, preserve brand voice, and publish higher-impact content faster.
description.bodyMd:
The AI Workshop for Tech Writers and Content Creators is a live, seven-week cohort that helps technical communicators and content teams weave generative AI into their daily production workflows.

## Outcomes
- Automate repetitive content production tasks and accelerate delivery timelines.
- Tailor generative AI outputs to match established voice, tone, and terminology.
- Connect content decisions to audience journeys, measurable outcomes, and ROI.

## What You Will Build
- Persona-driven workflows that use AI tools to surface gaps and opportunities.
- Ready-to-use prompt libraries, custom GPT instructions, and evaluation checklists.
- A documented project plan that operationalizes AI-assisted content production.
- Digital certificate of completion once the Week 7 project is presented.

## Who This Is For
- Technical communication and documentation specialists modernizing their workflows with AI.
- Content strategists responsible for aligning deliverables to user journeys and business goals.
- Knowledge teams supporting structured and unstructured content across the enterprise.

highlights: Automate repetitive content production tasks with AI
Preserve brand voice with reusable prompts and guardrails
Ship a final project and earn a completion certificate
audienceBullets: Technical communication and documentation specialists modernizing their workflows with AI.
Content strategists responsible for aligning deliverables to user journeys and business goals.
Knowledge teams supporting structured and unstructured content across the enterprise.
buildBullets: Persona-driven workflows that use AI tools to surface gaps and opportunities.
Ready-to-use prompt libraries, custom GPT instructions, and evaluation checklists.
A documented project plan that operationalizes AI-assisted content production.
Digital certificate of completion once the Week 7 project is presented.
outcomes: Automate repetitive content production tasks and accelerate delivery timelines.
Tailor generative AI outputs to match established voice, tone, and terminology.
Connect content decisions to audience journeys, measurable outcomes, and ROI.

agenda.title: Week 1: Adopting the AI Mindset
agenda.outcome: Explore AI foundations for content teams and align on ethical guardrails.
agenda.details: Map quick wins that remove repetitive production work. Practice prompt basics for clarity, structure, and factual rigor.

agenda.title: Week 2: Mapping Your Audience Journey
agenda.outcome: Build personas and user journeys that guide AI-augmented content.
agenda.details: Align messaging and assets to each audience touchpoint. Test AI tools that simulate reader questions and expectations.

agenda.title: Week 3: Personalization at Scale
agenda.outcome: Deliver platform-specific versions without sacrificing consistency.
agenda.details: Automate tone, style, and format adjustments with controlled prompts. Design custom GPT instructions to replicate your brand voice.

agenda.title: Week 4: Accelerating Value Delivery
agenda.outcome: Streamline production workflows and remove bottlenecks.
agenda.details: Run AI-powered content audits to prioritize improvements. Plan projects and tasks that increase overall content ROI.

agenda.title: Week 5: Deep Content Insights
agenda.outcome: Identify gaps, new opportunities, and research angles with AI.
agenda.details: Develop outlines and drafts for net-new assets. Define the project you will evolve through Week 7.

agenda.title: Week 6: Data-Driven Prioritization
agenda.outcome: Use customer insights to prioritize content that converts.
agenda.details: Apply advanced prompting techniques to sharpen clarity. Review progress on your individual or team project.

agenda.title: Week 7: Evolving with AI
agenda.outcome: Present final projects and gather peer plus mentor feedback.
agenda.details: Codify a long-term roadmap for AI-enabled content operations. Operationalize your workflow and celebrate the cohort completion.
